Q_DESC:
Micro has an array 
A having N strings made of lower case English alphabets. He is interested in finding out the length of the longest string that occurs as a substring among all the strings in A.

Now as you know strings hate Micro, so he asked Alex for help. Since Alex is busy organizing Code Alex, he assigned this task to you.

Input:
First line consists of a single integer denoting 
N
N.
Each of the following 
N
N lines consists of a single string made of lower case English alphabets.

Output:
Print the length of the longest common substring among all strings in A.

Constraints:
1N10^6
1|A[i]|10^6

The sum of lengths of all Strings in A shall not exceed 
10^6.
